Ciste Dhubh

Hear pronunciation Press to hear pronunciation

Ciste Dhubh is a dramatically pointed summit set some way back from Cluanie and Glen Shiel. It is a fine and very distinctive peak of great character.

 You have not climbed Ciste Dhubh.

Region: Kintail

Altitude: 979 metres

Users' Rating:
  • Currently 4.09/5
Rating: 4.1/5 (58 votes cast)

You must be registered and signed-in to vote

Detailed route description and map

Ciste Dhubh and Am Bathach from the Cluanie Inn

Other routes and challenges

Ciste Dhubh could be climbed on its own by omitting Am Bathach. Approaches from other directions are deterred by remoteness,

Walker-friendly accommodation in the area

Kintail Hotels

Kintail B&B

Kintail Cottages

There are 2880 Walkhighlanders who have climbed Ciste Dhubh. They have contributed 65 public walk reports including this summit. These are ordered below with the most popular ones first. The rightmost column shows how many summits were included in their report, which may help you to find the most relevant reports.
